title: Filtering for English Tweets: Unsupervised Language Detection on Twitter
description:
(See a demo here.)

While working on a Twitter sentiment analysis project, I ran into the problem of needing to filter out all non-English tweets. (Asking the Twitter API for English-only tweets doesn’t seem to work, as it nonetheless returns tweets in Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Russian, and a couple â€¦
